nodes.text: Sprawl 18 was a floating ranch located on the planet Tyed Kant. It housed Gryseium Incorporated, a subsidiary of Corazon Industries. During the Galactic Civil War, Sabel Axis Corazon had the Mynock virus developed here. Her plans were thwarted by a group of rebel agents, who infected Sprawl 18 with the modified Mynock II virus.
